text: Mujeeb Ur Rahman Zadran (Pashto: مجیب الرحمن ځدراڼ; born 28 March 2001) is an Afghan cricketer, who plays for the Afghanistan national cricket team. ==IPL== In January 2018, he was bought by the Kings XI Punjab in the 2018 IPL auction. On 8 April 2018, at the age of 17 years and 11 days, he became the youngest cricketer to play in the Indian Premier League. Mujeeb was just 17 years and 11 days old when he made his debut in IPL. In February 2021, Mujeeb was bought for INR 1.5 crores by the Sunrisers Hyderabad in the IPL auction ahead of the 2021 Indian Premier League. ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Afghan cricketers Category:21st-century Afghan people
title: Mujeeb Ur Rahman
